title: White fury: The untamed Tibet
creator_credit: Greg Grainger and Seven Network Limited (Australia)
brief_description: A white-water raft adventure in Tibet through some of the most beautiful and dangerous rivers in the world. Join the Australian Himalayan Expeditions adventurers as they take on the journey of a lifetime.
description: A white-water raft adventure in Tibet through some of the most beautiful and dangerous rivers in the world. Join the Australian Himalayan Expeditions adventurers as they take on the journey of a lifetime.
